ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.story_title: Ivermectin can kill COVID-19 within 48 hours', Monash University study finds
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.summary: A few institutes in Australia have found that Ivermectin which is an anti parasite drug can stop the growth of SARS Covid 19 virus within 48 hours. Ivermevtin has already proved to be effective in other viral diseases. Since we do not have any vaccine yet, it might be helpful to use Ivermectin as a possible medicine even though we do not know how the medicine works on the virus. We will need further tests to check the effectiveness of Ivermectin on Covid 19.
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.what: Role of Ivermectin in combating SARS-CoV-2 virus
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.who: FDA, Australia's Monash Biomedicine Discovery Institute (BDI) , Doherty Institute
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.why: It can confirm if we can use Ivermectin to spread the growth of Covid- 19 virus

challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.story_title: Challenges expected for Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine in USA
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.summary: The results of Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine trials in Mexico demonstrated the efficacy of the vaccine reduced with the increase in dose.
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.what: Challenges expected for Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine in USA
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.why: Highlight the challenges of Novavax Covid vaccine in USA

australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.story_title: Australian GPs urged to prescribe ivermectin triple therapy to fight COVID-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.summary: Thomas Borody a Sydney-based gastroenterologist, has stated that Ivermectin triple therapy can be the fastest way to fight Covid-19. He has requested the GP's in Australia to prescribe this medicine to covid patients as it is completely safe to use.
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.what: Australian GPs request to allow ivermectin triple therapy to be used as a possible medicine to fight COVID-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.why: It can confirm if we can use Ivermectin Triple Therapy to spread the growth of Covid- 19 virus. As the vaccine will take time and approving a drug also takes time.

japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.story_title: Japan is first country to approve COVID-19 cocktail Ronapreve
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.summary: Japan approved the use a certain kind of cocktail in Covid 19 patients as it develops antibodies against the virus and reduces the risk of hospitalization and deaths.
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.what: How the cocktail Ronapreve has proved effective against Covid 19 virus in Japan
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.why: Why did Japan approve a cocktail to be used against Covid 19

pfizer.summary: Pfizer has announced that Myfembree can be used against heavy menstrual bleeding. As per an evidence from UK, Pfizer vaccines are effective against Indian Covid variant. Uk also increased the shelf life of Pfizer medicines to 31 days. European commison has signed agreement with Pfizer to supply 900 million doses of Comirnaty. Pfizer  initiate FDA rolling BLA submission for their COVID-19 vaccine. Health Canada has approved to use Covid vaccine by Pfizer for children between 12-15 years. Sales of Comirnaty, a Pfizer vaccine has led to a strong financial results for Pfizer.

astrazeneca.summary: Astrazeneca showed strong financial results in the first quarter of 2021. EU sues Astrazeneca for the short supplies. The FDA EU approval can boost the confidence in Astrazeneca vaccines. It has also proved to be effective against Indian virus. India has delayed the supply of Astrazeneca shots. EMA finds that Astrazeneca vaccine can be linked to possible blood clots in patients. The first few supplies of Astrazeneca doses has arrived in low and middle income countries towards the beginning of 2021.
